name: Versus.
description:
Fight side by side with your friend against a rival team or let your friend be your worst enemy! Check your skills on your own statistics. Modify your weapons according to your own specifications and test them on your shooting range!

play Against Your Friends Or Enemies!

You want to stand up to your mate? No problem! It's time to settle this dispute.
There can only be one survivor!

Try out all your firearms on your shooting range!




On your own shooting range you can test your self modified weapons! (Work in Progress)
This way you can prepare yourself perfectly for your enemies.

Experience incredibly detailed maps made possible with the new Unreal Engine 5!




Thanks to the new Unreal Engine 5 and the small maps you will be able to play on highly detailed maps.
Experience battles in an incredible atmosphere!
More maps are in development and in planning.

Your arsenal offers everything you could dream of!




You will be able to modify your weapons. No matter if silencer, scope, or tactical stock. (Work in Progress)
So you can adapt your weapons directly to your playstyle!
